swap_order_desc_tooltip_value_difference: The estimated price difference between input and output amounts.
swap_smart_routing_desc: X Routing finds the best LP (Liquidity Provider) and the best route that minimizes slippage and network fees across hundreds of DEX (Decentralized Exchange) to offer you the best swap rates. It allows you to swap crypto in one click within our transparent and advanced DEX & Bridge aggregator at the best prices across 10+ networks, 100+ DEXs, and 3 cross-chain bridges.

swaptrade_dialog_toast_daylimit: You've reached the daily order limit of Swap for gas. Please try again tomorrow.
swaptrade_dialog_toast_gasstation_desc:
Trading on blockchains requires paying a network fee with native tokens such as ETH, BNB, OKT, MATIC, etc. When you don't have these tokens to make a transaction, you can quickly swap tokens you already hold for native tokens using the Swap for gas feature (it's only available for a few networks).
Getting native tokens via Swap for gas also requires a network fee, which will be automatically factored into the amount you pay.
You'll see an estimated number of general transactions when placing an order on Swap for gas. It refers to the number of token transfers you can make with your selected amount. The actual number may vary.
*Available only for OKX Wallet
swaptrade_dialog_toast_subtitle_activity: The event of receiving an extra {percentage}% has ended. The amount you'll get now is {value} {symbol}. Do you want to continue?
swaptrade_dialog_toast_subtitle_chanceen: You've already received the {percentage}% bonus in a previous transaction. The amount you'll get now is {value} {symbol}. Do you want to continue?
swaptrade_dialog_tooltips_gasstation_tip: When you don't have native tokens to pay network fees, you can quickly swap your holding tokens for them on Gas Station.
The Gas Station fee will be subtracted from the amount you pay.
An assessment of the general transactions you can make will be provided for your reference, which refers to token transfers.
swaptrade_dialog_tooltips_reference_tips: This is the estimated exchange rate on Swap for gas. It's calculated by taking into account market prices and rates from centralized exchanges. The actual rate may vary when your order is confirmed. Using the Swap for gas service also requires a network fee, which will be automatically factored into the amount you pay.

swaptrade_extension_intro_text_besttradi: We connect over 10 blockchains, 100 decentralized exchanges, and offer over 100,000 crypto assets in one place. This allows us to offer the largest variety of quotes on the market.

OKX's X Routing algorithm finds the best price across every DEX (Decentralized Exchange). It optimizes your output by finding the best LP (Liquidity Provider) and the best route that minimizes slippage and network fees.

swaptrade_extension_mid_tooltip_slippage: Slippage refers to the difference in percentage between the expected trading price and the final price after the transaction is complete. If the final asset price is greater than the slippage tolerance, your order will be canceled. E.g. A $100 bitcoin order with a 2% slippage tolerance wouldn't go through if the price of bitcoin increased to make your total more than $102 by the time the transaction is submitted

swaptrade_smartrouting_dialogue_desc_bes: We connect over 10 blockchains, 100 decentralized exchanges, and offer over 100,000 crypto assets in one place. This allows us to offer the largest variety of quotes on the market.

OKX's X Routing algorithm finds the best price across every DEX. We compare prices from Liquidity Providers (LPs) with the best liquidity pools, split orders, and consider prices, slippage, and network gas fees.
swaptrade_smartrouting_dialogue_desc_cro: Trade a variety of crypto assets across numerous blockchains in one click with minimal slippage and the best trading prices.

wallet_swap_adjustslip_modal_advice_slip: We recommend setting the slippage tolerance between 20%～50% for the transaction to go through, considering the {tokenSymbol} burning mechanism.
We recommend setting the slippage tolerance at 50% for the transaction to go through, considering the {tokenSymbol} burning mechanism.
Considering the burning mechanism of {tokenSymbol}, we recommend setting the slippage tolerance between {slippageTolerance}%～50% to make sure your transaction goes through.
wallet_swap_adjustslip_modal_slip_notsup: The {tokenSymbol} burning mechanism requires a slippage tolerance above 50%. For the safety of your assets, this transaction will not be executed.
wallet_swap_dialog_quote_instruction: X Routing chooses the best route to place an order through different DEXs. We compare prices based on Liquid Providers' best liquidity pools, splitting orders, considering asset prices, slippage, and network gas fees.
wallet_swap_hover_popup_comparedtodex: Amount saved is calculated by comparing the quote and network fee of {dexName}
wallet_swap_popup_value_difference_desc: Possibly due to insufficient liquidity, you'll receive less once the trade is completed. Please take caution before moving on
wallet_swap_toast_deposit_wallet_dashboa: Please deposit your {coin} in the wallet dashboard before swap
wallet_swap_toast_reserve_mainnet_token: We set aside some crypto to pay for the network gas fee.
wallet_swap_toast_scam_token_desc: For the safety of your assets, trading this token is not supported.
wallet_swap_toast_special_token: This transaction contains special tokens, so we adjusted the slippage to a reasonable range based on its burning mechanism.
wallet_swap_toast_value_differs: The transaction value differs by over 10%
